valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 5 Dec 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 6 Dec 2025
general_synopsis: Low Tyne 996 losing its identity. Atlantic low expected Rockall 971 by midnight tonight
